text: Thenmala is a town of tourist attraction near Punalur town, Kollam district in Kerala, India. ==Eco-tourism== Thenmala is the first planned eco-tourism centre in India. The Thenmala Dam is a popular ecotourism centre in Kerala. Thenmala dam is the second largest irrigation project in Kerala. ==Gallery== Sway bridge.jpg|Suspension Bridge തെന്മല പരപ്പാർ ഡാം.JPG|Parappar dam ==References== ==Other websites== * Thenmala Attractions Category:Villages in Kollam district
title: Thenmala
